settings.title: Stay in the know
settings.text: Join the tribe to receive news about new gear & upcoming events.

settings.title: Delfina x Mulga
settings.subheading: Our epic new Australian Youth Water Polo Champs range featuring the legendary Aussie Artist Mulga is now available for pre-order for a LIMITED TIME :)

settings.title: How it’s made:  Water Polo Australia
settings.subheading: From design through to dominance – check out our short video of the process from design, through production and finally to our Australian Men’s and Women’s Water Polo Teams in their Delfina caps and costumes competing at the highest level.

settings.title: Olympic Quality
settings.text: We know quality customised swimwear and aquatic apparel! We are run by Olympic athletes who have tried and tested our range and we are always searching for and creating the next innovations in materials, cuts, fits and styles.

settings.title: Amazing turnaround
settings.text: We can turn your order of customised swimwear and aquatic apparel around in just over 3 weeks from order delivery. For even more urgent orders, let us know and let’s see if we can work some magic for you!

settings.title: Free design and zero costs
settings.text: Unlike our competitors, we don’t charge for designs or setting up production. We don’t believe in arbitrary costs so don’t charge them!

settings.title: Customer First
settings.text: We at Delfina Sport want to put you first. This means super low minimum quantities, round the clock responsiveness, rapid design, impeccable customer service and we will do what it takes to ensure complete satisfaction.

settings.title: DESIGN
settings.text: Let’s make something amazing! Work with our expert design team to create the perfect design for your team.

settings.title: ORDERING
settings.text: Select from our wide range of products, get sized up and confirm the order.

settings.title: PRODUCTION
settings.text: Your order is hand crafted in our European HQ with the latest in cutting edge in Italian materials

settings.title: DELIVERY
settings.text: We express ship fully tracked worldwide so you can dominate in Delfina sooner

Their quality was first class and unlike other products are very much still in great shape"

Our athletes play with confidence and pride when they are wearing their Delfina Queensland swimwear"

settings.text: "Delfina are the best! We use them for all our team kit - in and out of the water!"

settings.title: Queensland University of Technology
settings.text: “Delfina sport has really changed the game for quality Water Polo products. This is the 3rd season we have used their caps and togs. Their designs and products are nothing short of exceptional. The togs always look great on the Tigers when competing in finals.”

settings.title: Sydney Stingers
settings.text: "Delfina Sport have been supplying Sydney Stingers Water Polo with swimwear and caps for the last 3 seasons. We keep returning to Delfina due to the high quality product, great customer service and fast turnaround on orders. They have also offered our club an amazing level of support both for fundraising and travelling internationally for tournaments - I couldn’t recommend them more highly."

settings.text: "Barracudas Water Polo couldn’t be happier with Delfina. Not only are we receiving great products at a terrific price, as a small club placing small orders, we are always treated as if our business is valuable and a priority."

settings.title: Phantoms Aquatics
settings.text: "We frequently have people ask us where we got our togs from and I couldn’t recommend Delfina Sport strongly enough!”

settings.title: Don't take our word for it
settings.text: Hear what some of our amazing customers have to say

settings.title: Care instructions
settings.text:
AVOID ROUGH SURFACES
Sitting and/or rubbing against textured pool decks and any rough edges or objects can ruin the quality texture of your swimwear. 

AVOID GETTING EXCESS LOTIONS & OILS ON YOUR SWIMWEAR
Sunscreen, tanning oils, and cosmetics can be harmful to swimsuits. Avoid direct contact with the suit when applying lotions.

RINSE YOUR SWIMSUIT AFTER EACH WEAR
By rinsing your swimsuits in cold or warm fresh water, you will help remove the excess salt and chlorine.

GENTLY WASH YOUR SUITS
We do not recommend to soak, machine wash, tumble dry or to iron your swimsuits

settings.title: Materials
settings.text:
Fabric Weight: 200 gr/sqcm
53% Polyester
47% Polyester PBT
Double lined and chlorine resistant
UV/SPF 50+ Protection

settings.title: Colours
settings.answer: If you have particular PMS colour codes, please advise us but we do suggest sending a physical colour chart to you so you can match our Delfina Colour codes with what you already use. Please contact us to get your colour chart sent out to you today

settings.title: Pricing
settings.answer: Our custom wear prices start as low as $25.00 + GST. We do not have any set up costs or hidden fees. Get Started today by filling out our online enquiry form.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.answer:
Your order will shipped and delivered to the desired location specified with each item labelled for size and individually packaged. The total time between confirmation of the order and delivery take within 16 business days (unless otherwise specified) arriving in your hands fast for your immediate use.

Shipping Rates

We have established a great relationship with our shipping providers and as such, can offer you free shipping. This may only differ in the case of rushed international (outside of Australia) orders and express shipment requirements as per below.

Carriers

We use a number of logistics companies and carriers to delivery our products to you. We can monitor the delivery and provide a tracking number and information upon your request.

Express Shipments

We can express post items when requested. These shipments will be payable by the customer as negotiated prior to the shipping confirmation.

settings.title: Refunds
settings.answer: We will respond to enquirers within 24 hours. We will fast-track designs and offer expedited delivery methods if need be. In the unlikely event of customer dissatisfaction, we will exhaust all measures to rectify the situation and find the solution.

settings.title: TYLER MARTIN
settings.subtitle: Founder and Managing Director
settings.text: 2016 Olympian | Founded Delfina Sport in 2013 | Australian water polo player | Played professionally in Italy, Hungary and France | Commerce Marketing degree

settings.text: 2012 and 2016 Olympian | Played professionally in Hungary and Croatia | Tournament All star team in 2015 World Championship | Regarded as one of the best players in the world and one of the best shooters | Studying a Business Degree

settings.subtitle: Sales South Africa
settings.text: South African Water Polo Players | Graduated from Arizona State university | Based in Johannesburg
